# Fire (Domain)
## Overview
| **Deities:** | *Asgardian:* | Surtur |
|---|---|---|
| | *Eberron:* | Onatar |
| | *Golarion:* | Asmodeus, Sarenrae |
| | *Greyhawk:* | [[Obad-Hai]] |
| | *Kalamar:* |  |
| | *Krynn:* | Reorx, Sargonnas, Sirrion |
| | *Olympian:* | [[Hephaestus]] |
| | *Other:* | Taiia (destroyer aspect) |
| | *Pharaonic:* | Apep, Set, Sobek |
| | *Toril:* | Gond, Kossuth, Talos |

**Granted Powers**: You can call forth fire, command creatures of the inferno, and your f lesh does not burn.

- *Fire Bolt (Sp)*: As a standard action, you can unleash a scorching bolt of divine fire from your outstretched hand. You can target any single foe within 30 feet as a ranged touch attack with this bolt of fire. If you hit the foe, the fire bolt deals 1d6 points of fire damage + 1 point for every two cleric levels you possess. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier.
- *Fire Resistance (Ex)*: At 6th level, you gain resist fire 10. This resistance increases to 20 at 12th level. At 20th level, you gain immunity to fire.

**Fire Domain Spells**

**1** **[[Burning Hands (Spell)|Burning Hands]]****:** 1d4/level fire damage (max 5d4).

**2** **[[Produce Flame (Spell)|Produce Flame]]****:** 1d6 damage + 1/level, touch or thrown.

**3** **[[Fireball (Spell)|Fireball]]****:** 1d6 damage per level, 20-ft. radius.

**4** **[[Wall of Fire (Spell)|Wall of Fire]]****:** Deals 2d4 fire damage out to 10 ft. and 1d4 out to 20 ft. Passing through wall deals 2d6 damage +1/level.

**5** **[[Fire Shield (Spell)|Fire Shield]]****:** Creatures attacking you take fire damage; youâ€™re protected from heat or cold.

**6** **[[Fire Seeds (Spell)|Fire Seeds]]****:** Acorns and berries become grenades and bombs.

**7** **[[Elemental Body IV (Spell)|Elemental Body IV]]** (fire only)**:** Turns you into a Huge elemental. 

**8** **[[Incendiary Cloud (Spell)|Incendiary Cloud]]****:** Cloud deals 6d6 fire damage/round. 

**9** **[[Elemental Swarm (Spell)|Elemental Swarm]]** (fire spell only)**:** Summons multiple elementals.
